name: Idle Farm 3d: Business Empire
description:
Tired of similar 2d farming games? You should try something new. Idle Farm is a new clicker game with beautiful 3d animations, beautiful low-poly animals, complex farming equipment, buses, planes, and much more.

Can you run your Farm better than everyone else? This is your day, become the wealthiest farmer in the world. There is a lot of work to be done in the countryside, guide your farmers and become a countryside tycoon. Unlock different areas of the farm: peppers field, dairy area, sunflowers field, salad hotbed, wheat field, hayfield, apple trees, watermelons field, fish pond, carrots field, peaches, and much more. After your farmer finished all the work, he is attending the market to sold farm crops. The more villagers and areas you have unlocked, the richer you are. Get gems for achievements and use them to improve your game progress drastically.

Build your farm business empire now and, most importantly, have fun!

Contact us if you have any questions or suggestions on how to improve our game. Thank you!
